communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-All emails, written correspondence, Venice Senior High Principal Griego sent or received to investigators of the claim detailed in Venice Senior High's The Oarsman:
https://veniceoarsman.com/10832/news/fbi-investigating-predators-targeting-online-student-accounts/
As such, the claim that students received solicitations for money or images in a way that constituted a crime was committed, communication records to local law enforcement, private investigators, FBI employees/agents/contractors should be provided, whatsoever record of the FBI exists.
To successfully provide your record of messages exchanged between LAUSD (Los Angeles Unified School District) employees to FBI agents, employees, IC3, any contractor, investigator, police officer, or volunteer of your organization, names of any known victims proven to be a minor should be redacted with sequential labels as needed.

- In the event the alleged investigation was brought about by 'Contract', or the FBI was hired or solicited to investigate for a fee, record of those transactions are requested including correspondence of all parties involved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Remy Noìchlaf
